issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "1.1.1.1" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "2.2.2.2" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "www.google.com." 5 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "10.10.10.10" 4 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "productpage.ns1." 4 times.
